name: Noggle Statue - Violence
description: A small wobbly statue of Stalker's Acolyte, Violence.

languages.description: Ein kleine Wackelfigur vom Akolythen des Stalkers, Gewalt.
languages.name: Noggle-Statue: Gewalt

languages.description: Une petite statue à tête oscillante de Violence, un des disciples du Stalker.
languages.name: Statuette Noggle - Violence

languages.description: Una statuetta del discepolo dello Stalker, Violence, con la testa tremolante.
languages.name: Statuetta Noggle - Violence

languages.description: 스토커의 어콜라이트, 바이올런스의 갸웃거리는 작은 인형입니다.
languages.name: 노글 스태츄 - 바이올런스

languages.description: Una pequeña y tambaleante estatua de uno de los discípulos de Stalker, Violencia.
languages.name: Estatua Tambaleante - Violencia

languages.description: 一小座追猎者的追随者，暴力摇头娃娃。
languages.name: 暴力摇头娃娃

languages.description: Stalkerの従者のボブルヘッド人形、Violence。
languages.name: Violence ボブルヘッド

languages.description: Mała chybotliwa figurka Akolity Stalkera: Przemoc.
languages.name: Figurka Noggle — Przemoc

languages.description: Uma estatueta articulada de um discípulo do Stalker, Violência.
languages.name: Estatueta: Violência

languages.description: 一小座 Stalker 的追隨者－暴力的搖頭娃娃。
languages.name: 暴力搖頭娃娃

languages.description: รูปปั้นตุ๊กตาหัวโยกขนาดเล็กของผู้ช่วยเหลือ Stalker - Violence
languages.name: รูปปั้น Noggle - Violence

languages.description: Stalker Acolyte, Violence küçük oynar figür.
languages.name: Noggle Heykeli - Violence

languages.description: Статуетка прибічника Сталкера на ім’я Насилля.
languages.name: Ноґл «Насилля»
